 1997-10501997-07-250,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
PrecisOrder (a) repealing a previous Exclusion Approval Order made in 1995 affecting lawyers in the LA Group (Law), and (b) approving the exemption of appointments and deployments to positions within the Department of Justice in the LA Group (Law), at the LA-2B level and above, from the application of specified provisions of the Act respecting appeals and recourse.
